cause.description:
The Human Fund is an organization founded in 1997 to better aid destitute inner city individuals during the times of extreme need of the winter holidays. The Human Fund has raised over $20,000 so far in small community coin drops and bake sales, and donates ALL proceeds to helping those in need.
1. People must be given aid
2. Inner city homeless/destitute need aid during the winter holidays
cause.name: The Human Fund: Money For People
